TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SqlCacheDependencyAdmin extends System.Object
public ref class SqlCacheDependencyAdmin abstract sealed

summary.span: 在使用基于轮询的依赖项时，执行 SQL Server 数据库上需要的管理任务以支持 类。

span.span: Performs administrative tasks required on a SQL Server database to support the class when using polling-based dependencies.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类方法可用于以编程方式启用和禁用 SQL Server 数据库和其表对象更改通知。You can use the methods of this class to programmatically enable and disable a SQL Server database and its tables for object change notifications. 此外，此类获取的信息的数据库中的表启用更改通知使用方法。In addition, this class obtains information about which tables in a database are enabled for change notifications using the method. 但是，您可以使用提供的 Aspnet_regsql 命令行工具来管理 SQL Server 数据库和其表的更改通知。However, you can also use the Aspnet_regsql command-line tool to manage change notifications for a SQL Server database and its tables. > [!NOTE] > 若要在此类中调用任何一种方法，用于访问 SQL Server 数据库的帐户必须具有创建表和存储的过程的权限。To call any of the methods in this class, the account you use to access the SQL Server database must have permissions to create tables and stored procedures. 若要启用特定的表上的通知，必须有权在该表上创建 SQL Server 触发器。To enable notifications on a specific table, you must have permissions to create a SQL Server trigger on that table. 有关如何在数据库上设置权限的详细信息，请参阅 SQL Server 文档。For more information on how to set permissions on a database, see the SQL Server documentation. 有关使用 ASP.NET 进程的帐户的详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 模拟](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0cb3024-562f-4184-9d3c-095504787d3d)。For more information about the account used by the ASP.NET process, see [ASP.NET Impersonation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a0cb3024-562f-4184-9d3c-095504787d3d). ## Examples 下面的代码示例是一个简单的 ASP.NET 页面，用于启用和禁用对 SQL Server 数据库表的更改通知。The following code example is a simple ASP.NET page for enabling and disabling change notifications on SQL Server database tables. 它使用对象来管理在名为的连接字符串中指定的数据库中的更改通知`MyConnectionString`。It uses the object to manage change notifications in the database specified in a connection string called `MyConnectionString`. 该示例包含两个文件、 定义用户界面的.aspx 文件和代码隐藏文件包含源代码的 ASP.NET 事件。The example includes two files, an .aspx file that defines the user interface and a code-behind file containing the source code for the ASP.NET events. 第一个示例是定义用户界面的.aspx 文件。The first sample is the .aspx file that defines the user interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx#10)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx#10)] 第二个示例是包含源代码的页面事件的代码隐藏文件。The second sample is the code-behind file containing the source code for the page events. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/CS/cacheDependencyAdmincs.aspx.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/cacheDependencyAdminvb.aspx.vb#1)]

param.name: connectionString
param.span: 用于与 SQL Server 数据库建立连接的连接字符串。

span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

summary.span: 禁用指定数据库的 更改通知。

span.span: Disables change notifications for the specified database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的数据库中删除对更改通知的支持`connectionString`参数。The method removes support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 在你运行后方法，您必须运行方法如果你想要重新启用更改通知的数据库。Once you have run the method, you must run the method if you wish to re-enable change notifications for a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法，以禁用更改通知的连接字符串由指定的数据库`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to disable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. [!code-vb[CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependencyAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CachingSamples_SqlCacheDependencyAdmin/VB/sqlcachedep2vb.aspx#1)]

exception.span: ASP.NET 应用程序的安全性上下文没有禁用数据库通知的权限。

span.span: The security context of the ASP.NET application does not have permission to disable notifications for the database.

summary.span: 禁用 SQL Server 数据库表或数据库表数组的 更改通知。

span.span: Disables change notifications on a SQL Server database table or an array of database tables.

span.span: Disables change notifications on a SQL Server database table.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法禁用更改为指定的表中的通知`table`参数中指定的数据库中必须是`connectionString`参数。The method disables change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您使用过方法，以禁用更改通知的一个表，则必须使用其中一个重载，如果你想要重新启用更改通知。Once you have used the method to disable change notifications for a table, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例禁用更改连接字符串中指定的表上的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example disables change notification on a table specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除从表中指定的更改通知`tables`参数。The method removes change notifications from the tables specified in the `tables` parameter. 这些表中指定的数据库中必须是`connectionString`参数。These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您使用过方法，以禁用更改通知的列表的表，则必须使用其中一个重载，如果你想要重新启用更改通知。Once you have used the method to disable change notifications for a list of tables, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to re-enable change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从指定的数据库中添加了对更改通知支持`connectionString`参数。The method adds support for change notifications from the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 在你运行后方法，您必须运行方法如果你想要禁用更改通知的数据库。Once you have run the method, you must run the method if you wish to disable change notifications for a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法，以使更改通知的连接字符串由指定的数据库`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications for the database specified by the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. summary.span: 连接到指定 SQL Server 数据库并为 更改通知启用指定数据库表。

span.span: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified database table for change notifications.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加指定的表中的更改通知`table`参数中指定的数据库中必须是`connectionString`参数。The method adds change notifications for the table specified in the `table` parameter, which must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您使用过方法将添加到表更改通知，则必须使用其中一个重载，如果你想要禁用更改通知。Once you have used the method to add change notifications to a table, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to disable change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法，以使更改在连接字符串中指定的数据库中的指定表的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications on the specified table in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. span.span: Connects to the specified SQL Server database and enables the specified array of database tables for change notification.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将添加中指定的表的更改通知`tables`参数。The method adds change notifications for the tables specified in the `tables` parameter. 这些表中指定的数据库中必须是`connectionString`参数。These tables must be in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter. 一旦您使用过方法将添加到一组表更改通知，则必须使用其中一个重载，如果你想要禁用更改通知。Once you have used the method to add change notifications to a group of tables, you must use one of the overloads if you wish to disable change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用方法，以使更改在连接字符串中指定的数据库中以分号分隔的列表中指定的表上的通知`MyConnectionString`。The following code example uses the method to enable change notifications on the tables specified in a semicolon-delimited list in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic. param.span: 用于与 SQL Server 数据库建立连接的连接字符串。

span.span: A connection string used to connect to the SQL Server database.

summary.span: 检索一个字符串数组，该数组包含 SQL Server 数据库中为更改通知启用的每个表的名称。

span.span: Retrieves a string array containing the name of every table that is enabled for change notifications in a SQL Server database.

returns.span: 一个字符串数组，其中包含 SQL Server 数据库表的名称。

span.span: A string array that contains the names of the SQL Server database tables.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法返回包含在指定的数据库中的所有表的名称的字符串数组`connectionString`为更改通知启用的参数。The method returns a string array containing the names of all tables in the database specified in the `connectionString` parameter that are enabled for change notifications. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建的连接字符串中指定的数据库中的更改通知启用的表的字符串数组`MyConnectionString`。The following code example creates a string array of the tables enabled for change notifications in the database specified in the connection string `MyConnectionString`. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述主题。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview topic.
